title: Peppermint Oreo Cookie Review - Oreo Oration
description:
Another mint Oreo enters the fray. Greg reviews it.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/gameovergreggy?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [ Music] [ Applause] [Music] what's up everybody Welcome to Oreo I'm Greg and while you were trying to figure out how Mario breeds in Space the fine people at Oreo are making endless variations to Milk's Favorite Cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package then give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like the video subscribe to our Channel and share it with your friends today we're reviewing peppermint Oreos yes you know you got the mint Oreos you got the mint fudge cream Oreos you got the candy cane Oreos and Oreos still like guess what we're going to Milk The Mint a little bit longer with peppermint cream please stop ore it's a holidayish Oreo but of course these remind you when you go out to dinner with your parents and you get the little mints on the way out right oh what a what a lovely dinner and they're red they got a got all that leftover red dye from the Holiday anyways every or ation begins with the patented first look oh These Guys these

way out right oh what a what a lovely dinner and they're red they got a got all that leftover red dye from the Holiday anyways every oration begins with the patented first look oh These Guys these are some dirty little jerks look at them they got they got the black crumbs all over them they're not spaced out that well they got the rib for your pleasure packaging though which I'm always a fan of some broken ones here but as usual with any mint Oreo you better believe it smells like mint brother you think you're not getting some mint and mint ore oh man it don't matter but it smells good remember Oreos I think I blacked out remember Oreos always going up against the the Girl Scouts there with their little Thin Mints these have that flavor that smell holy am I still here what is happening right now anyways let's move on to taste again broken up it's a broken little guy he's not looking great he's seen some better times though mhm my immediate sensation of course it tastes not my

right now anyways let's move on to taste again broken up it's a broken little guy he's not looking great he's seen some better times though mhm my immediate sensation of course it tastes not my sensation my immediate analysis it's a bit dry on First Bite which is a weird thing to say about an Oreo cookie it's not stale just like the cream coverage wasn't where I usually like it um but yeah it tastes a little thin mint y but the the chocolate cookie part is overpowering the cream it's good not great M yeah it's and we've had better uh Oreos that are trying to mimic The Thin Mint though we know that for a fact dry it's drying out my throat here even before I milk pair it with milk getting getting dry up in here like I'm on a date and just not enjoying myself dry all right um up next we actually pair it with milk let's see how that goes all right time for the make a right moment

pair it with milk let's see how that goes all right time for the make a right moment one two three this solves the dry problem you know surprising no one the cookie itself is just breaking out of my hand though which is weird it happened with the other one too I didn't call it out I thought maybe it was a fluke all that one maintain structural Integrity um the milk makes it a bit better like I said we're far from our first mint Oreo right the oration has been going for a while we've been around the mint block this guy he's a pretender to throne let's see how it goes in the twist test perfect okay you I don't know what you want me to do with that I don't I mean it's I don't I'm not see this one's all broke too it's going to do the same yeah okay well one of the worst twist tests in quite some time now see I was with you for a little bit there I was somewhere like I said good I said it wasn't great so that mean puts this in the sevens I was thinking 7 five then you got to go into the
